tool_description: Processes multiple text inputs simultaneously with different voice configurations for efficient batch speech synthesis.

text_inputs.description: Array of text strings to synthesize

voice_configs.description: Voice configuration identifiers for each text

output_format.description: Audio output format: wav, mp3, flac

error_messages: Array length mismatch: text_inputs and voice_configs must have the same length.
Too many inputs: Maximum 50 text inputs allowed per batch.
Invalid output format: Use wav, mp3, or flac.
Invalid quality setting: Use fast, standard, or high.
Voice config error: One or more voice configurations are invalid.
Batch processing failed: Unable to complete synthesis for all inputs.
usage: Provide arrays of text inputs and corresponding voice configurations, specify output format and quality for efficient batch synthesis.

total_duration.description: Total duration of all generated audio in seconds
